constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 126 (Monday, July 19, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KUSTOFF:
H.R. 4523.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Under Article I, Section 8, the Necessary and Proper
Clause. Congress shall have power to make all laws which
shall be necessary and proper for carrying into Execution the
foregoing powers and all Powers vested by the Constituion in
the Government of the United States, or in any Department of
Officer thereof.
[Page H3669]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: Preserving Safe Communities by Ending Swatting Act of 2021
